attributes.action: lower the age of drinking and buying alchohol to the age of 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the age is lowered to 16 there will be less binge drinking because when younger people get alchohol they make the most of it while they have it...also in many other countrys the age is 16 and it does them no harm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
